import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CarDetailResponse } from './car-detail-response'; @Component({ selector: 'app-car-detail', templateUrl: './car-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./car-detail.component.css'] }) export class CarDetailComponent implements OnInit { @Input() item: CarDetailResponse | any; constructor(private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { } redirectToCarInfo(): void { // Butona tıklandığında "Car Info" component'e yönlendirme yapılıyor this.router.navigate(['/car-info/'+this.item.carId]); // "/car-info" route'unun tanımlı olması gerekiyor } }
{{item?.brandName}} | {{item?.modelName}}
{{item?.fuelTypeName}}
{{item?.gearTypeName}}
{{item.fileId | json }}

{{item?.createdDate}}
